body_text: Lint: prefer arrow functions. Eslint has some issues with async () => {}, but it is valid. If this is problematic for you, leave it and I'll fix it in my linter branch (which can deal with async () => {}).
body: Lint: prefer arrow functions. Eslint has some issues with `async () => {}`, but it is valid. If this is problematic for you, leave it and I'll fix it in my linter branch (which can deal with `async () => {}`).
